mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fountain of the Centaurs, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bitter, Karl Theodore Francis (American sculptor, 1867-1915) [work]
Weinman, Adolph Alexander (American sculptor, 1870-1952) [work]

mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cast of Karl Bitter’s bronze relief, “The Signing of the Louisiana Purchase Treaty."

The fountain depicts centaurs struggling with fish and sea serpents -- http://www.waymarking.com/waymarks/WM87D9_The_Fountain_of_the_Centaurs_Jefferson_City_Missouri. Perhaps the most interesting choice of the grouping by Weinman was the inclusion of a cast of Karl Bitter’s bronze relief, “The Signing of the Louisiana Purchase Treaty.” While the piece, surrounded in granite, provides the upward mobility needed for the area, it does mix historical sculpture with mythology, making the grouping somewhat abrupt for observers -- http://daytrippin.us/tag/karl-bitter/. [work]
